channel.title: Adding working summoning to your server
channel.description:
Hi guys this is my first tutorial on moparscape,
What do you need: Source Summoning package: [url=http://uppit.com/xlksuogdc13v/summoning.zip]http://uppit.com/xlksuogdc13v/summoning.zip[/url]
[Step1. Download the summoning package. [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/8246/packagez.png[/img]
Step2. Copy the package to the skills folder in your source. (...\Source\src\com\rs2hd\content\skills) [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/zwe138.png[/img]
Step3 (Final step). Extract the package and you are done. (do it like Extract in Summoning\) [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/5kfxqe.png[/img]
It should look like this when done. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/30rwdus.png[/img]

item.title: Adding working summoning to your server
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Not only would this not work, it would be considered a snippet if all you did was post the summoning source.

Read full topic
